languages.text: "Призрак" моей предшественницы — работа Идиры. Пусть ей окажут первую помощь и поместят под постоянную охрану. Потом решу, что с ней делать".

traits.locale_text: "Призрак" моей предшественницы — работа Идиры. Пусть ей окажут первую помощь и поместят под постоянную охрану. Потом решу, что с ней делать.

languages.text: "The 'ghost' of my predecessor was the work of Idira. She needs medical attention. See to that, and have her put under constant guard. I'll decide what to do with her later."
languages.original_text: "Призрак" моей предшественницы — работа Идиры. Пусть ей окажут первую помощь и поместят под постоянную охрану. Потом решу, что с ней делать".

traits.locale_text: "The 'ghost' of my predecessor was the work of Idira. She needs medical attention. See to that, and have her put under constant guard. I'll decide what to do with her later."
"The 'ghost' of my predecessor was the work of Idira. She needs medical attention. See to that, and have her put under constant guard. I'll decide what to do with her later."
"The 'ghost' of my predecessor was the work of Idira. She needs medical attention. See to that, and have her put under constant guard. I'll decide what to do with her later."
"The 'ghost' of my predecessor was the work of Idira. She needs medical attention. See to that, and have her put under constant guard. I'll decide what to do with her later."

languages.text: “前任行商浪人的‘幽灵’实际上是伊迪拉弄出来的。她需要护理，你负责确保她得到医护，要把她置于一刻不停的保护之中。我之后再决定该怎么处理她。”
languages.original_text: "The 'ghost' of my predecessor was the work of Idira. She needs medical attention. See to that, and have her put under constant guard. I'll decide what to do with her later."

traits.locale_text: “前任行商浪人的‘幽灵’实际上是伊迪拉弄出来的。她需要护理，你负责确保她得到医护，要把她置于一刻不停的保护之中。我之后再决定该怎么处理她。”

languages.text: «El "fantasma" de mi predecesora era obra de Idira. Necesita atención médica. Proporciónesela y manténgala bajo guardia constante. Decidiré qué hacer con ella más tarde».
languages.original_text: "The 'ghost' of my predecessor was the work of Idira. She needs medical attention. See to that, and have her put under constant guard. I'll decide what to do with her later."

traits.locale_text: «El "fantasma" de mi predecesora era obra de Idira. Necesita atención médica. Proporciónesela y manténgala bajo guardia constante. Decidiré qué hacer con ella más tarde».

languages.text: 「前任者の『亡霊』はイディラの仕業だった。彼女には治療が必要だ。彼女を常時護衛するように。処分をどうするかは後で決める」
languages.original_text: "The 'ghost' of my predecessor was the work of Idira. She needs medical attention. See to that, and have her put under constant guard. I'll decide what to do with her later."

traits.locale_text: 「前任者の『亡霊』はイディラの仕業だった。彼女には治療が必要だ。彼女を常時護衛するように。処分をどうするかは後で決める」

languages.text: "Der 'Geist' meiner Vorgängerin war Idiras Werk. Sie braucht medizinische Hilfe. Kümmert Euch darum und lasst sie rund um die Uhr bewachen. Ich werde später entscheiden, was ich mit ihr mache."
languages.original_text: "The 'ghost' of my predecessor was the work of Idira. She needs medical attention. See to that, and have her put under constant guard. I'll decide what to do with her later."

traits.locale_text: "Der 'Geist' meiner Vorgängerin war Idiras Werk. Sie braucht medizinische Hilfe. Kümmert Euch darum und lasst sie rund um die Uhr bewachen. Ich werde später entscheiden, was ich mit ihr mache."

languages.text: « Le "fantôme" de ma prédécesseure a débarqué par la faute d'Idira. Elle a besoin de soins. Occupez-vous-en, et faites-la surveiller en permanence. Je déciderai de son sort plus tard. »
languages.original_text: "The 'ghost' of my predecessor was the work of Idira. She needs medical attention. See to that, and have her put under constant guard. I'll decide what to do with her later."

traits.locale_text: « Le "fantôme" de ma prédécesseure a débarqué par la faute d'Idira. Elle a besoin de soins. Occupez-vous-en, et faites-la surveiller en permanence. Je déciderai de son sort plus tard. »

languages.text: "Selefimin 'hayaleti', İdira'nın başının altından çıkmış. Tıbbi yardıma ihtiyacı var. Bir cerrahla konuşun ve onu sürekli gözetim altında tutun. Onunla ne yapacağıma sonra karar vereceğim."
languages.original_text: "The 'ghost' of my predecessor was the work of Idira. She needs medical attention. See to that, and have her put under constant guard. I'll decide what to do with her later."

traits.locale_text: "Selefimin 'hayaleti', İdira'nın başının altından çıkmış. Tıbbi yardıma ihtiyacı var. Bir cerrahla konuşun ve onu sürekli gözetim altında tutun. Onunla ne yapacağıma sonra karar vereceğim."
